flags.bit: Bits 31:6 Reserved, must be kept at reset value.
Bit 5 PRFTBS: Prefetch buffer status This bit provides the status of the prefetch buffer.
Bit 3 HLFCYA: Flash half cycle access enable

Bits 2:0 LATENCY: Latency These bits represent the ratio of the SYSCLK (system clock) period to the Flash access time. 000 Zero wait state, if 0 < SYSCLK <= 24 MHz 001 One wait state, if 24 MHz < SYSCLK <= 48 MHz 010 Two wait states, if 48 MHz < SYSCLK <= 72 MHz
